Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Apartamentos Primeselect Los Alisios in Arona (Los Cristianos), you'll be convenient to Los Cristianos Beach and Golf Las Americas. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Las Vistas Beach and Arona Pyramid.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 146 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an outdoor tennis court, and bicycles to rent. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), shopping on site, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Apartamentos Primeselect Los Alisios. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Apartamentos Primeselect Los Alisios. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Los Cristianos Beach - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Golf Las Americas - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Las Vistas Beach - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Arona Pyramid - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Siam Park - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Veronicas Strip - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Camel Park - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Troya Beach - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Torviscas Beach - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Aqualand Costa Adeje - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Golf Los Palos - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Puerto Colon - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Gran Sur Shopping Center - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Bobo Beach - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Primeselect Los Alisios is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 12.8 km / 8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Los Alisios is Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFN-Tenerife North) - 59.6 km / 37 mi.
